Prestamos API Backend

Backend API deployed on Netlify Functions

✅ ACTIVE

API Endpoints

System

GET /.netlify/functions/health - API health check

Clients

GET /.netlify/functions/clients - Get all clients
POST /.netlify/functions/clients - Create new client
GET /.netlify/functions/clients/{cedula} - Get client by cédula
PUT /.netlify/functions/clients/{cedula} - Update client
DELETE /.netlify/functions/clients/{cedula} - Delete client

Préstamos

GET /.netlify/functions/prestamos - Get all prestamos
POST /.netlify/functions/prestamos - Create new prestamo
GET /.netlify/functions/prestamos/{id} - Get prestamo by ID
PUT /.netlify/functions/prestamos/{id} - Update prestamo
DELETE /.netlify/functions/prestamos/{id} - Delete prestamo

Environment Variables Required

  • MONGO_STRING or MONGODB_URI - MongoDB connection string

Usage

This API uses MongoDB as the database and is deployed as serverless functions on Netlify.

All endpoints support CORS and can be accessed from your frontend application.
